summary: I OWN AN  ISUZU RODEO 1999 THE LIGHT FOR THE ABS SYSTEM CAME ON AND DOES NOT GO AWAY PLUS I NOTICED SOMEBODY ALSO HAS PROBLEMS WITH THE GASOLINE METER IT HAPPENS THAT IT DOES NOT REGISTER EXACTLY HOW MUCH GAS IN  IT AND THE LIGHT SOMETIMES STAYS ON PLUS THE LAST ONE I HAVE NOT SEE IS THE PAINT IS CRACKED IN THE WHOLE BODY IS BLACK.  *NLM
